infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a backyard. A normal kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out a BBQ. [if there is something on the s_0]On the BBQ you see [a list of things on the s_0]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The BBQ appears to be empty.[end if] You can make out a clothesline. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the clothesline.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can make out a patio table! [if there is something on the s_2]On the patio table you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]However, the patio table, like an empty patio table, has nothing on it.[end if] Oh, great. Here's a workbench. The workbench is wooden.[if there is something on the s_3] On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if] You can see a patio chair. [if there is something on the s_4]On the patio chair you can make out [a list of things on the s_4]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the patio chair.[end if]

infos.name: clothesline
infos.desc: The [noun] is an unstable piece of junk.

metadata.goal: Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! You find yourself in a messy house. Many things are not in their usual location. Let's clean up this place. After you'll have done, this little house is going to be spick and span! Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.
